Name: Manly, Warringah and Pittwater Historical Society

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 10am-5pm by appointment. Reference assistance available in person and by mail. Copying services available for books, journals and photographs. Referral to paid researchers is available.

About.Access: 2 weeks' advance notice of visit desirable including details of proposed outcome of research. Proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: All items relating to the history of the Manly, Warringah and Pittwater areas.

Contact.Street address: Manly Municipal Library, Market Place, Manly 2095
